descriptionHtml:
This is my first ever player home/mod that I've evermade so be brutal on honest on your opinions and feedback.

This home can be found in Riften beside the Ratway.

It contains 2 npc's one merchant and one person who is just there. The home also comes with 1 custom weapon.
A mine has also been added, for easy access to ores, and it comes with one grand crafting room for all your crafting needs.

Please rate and give me some feedback on areas where I can improve, so that my next upload will be better, and grander.

Also if you want anything added feel free to ask, and I'll try to include it in an update.
author: Walter Brouwer
